objects.specification: A flat rectangular floor panel with a smooth matte finish surface in a neutral grey color, minimal thickness, designed to serve as the base for the booth.
A vertical rectangular wall panel with clean white matte finish, minimal thickness, serving as structural enclosure on one side of the booth.
A vertical rectangular wall panel with clean white matte finish, minimal thickness, serving as structural enclosure on one side of the booth.

A modern rectangular display table with smooth vibrant orange finish, flat tabletop supported by four sturdy legs, minimalistic design ideal for showcasing products.
A tall cylindrical display stand with glossy blue finish, smooth curved surface and a stable circular base, designed for highlighting promotional items at elevated height.
A tall cylindrical display stand with glossy blue finish, smooth curved surface and a stable circular base, designed for highlighting promotional items at elevated height.
A modern visitor chair featuring a light grey cushioned seat and slightly curved backrest, supported by slender metal legs with matte finish, ergonomic design without armrests.

A rectangular promotional banner in bright pink color featuring a subtle geometric pattern, reinforced edges and mounting grommets for hanging between walls.
A decorative potted plant composed of a cone-shaped pot and layered spherical foliage elements, all in deep green color, offering natural accent to the booth corners.

A simple rectangular registration desk with neutral grey matte finish, featuring a front panel and a slightly protruding countertop for guest sign-in.
An adjustable cylindrical spotlight fixture with warm yellow light emission, slim housing and recessed LED bulb, intended for ceiling suspension to illuminate display areas.

A festive balloon made of smooth semi-transparent material in vibrant color, with elastic thin string dangling beneath, creating a lively decorative accent at the booth edges.
